name: Cook the Book: Milk Chocolate Malt Ice Cream
description: This week's Cook the Book is Roast Chicken and Other Stories by Simon Hopkinson. If you haven't heard of Hopkinson, chances are you aren't English; in Britain, this book was voted the most useful cookbook ever by a group of...
recipeIngredient: 7 1/2 ounces milk chocolate, broken into small pieces

recipeInstructions.text: Heat the cream and milk together. Beat the egg yolks and malted milk powder together; add the hot milk–cream mixture. Blend thoroughly.
Return mixture to pan; heat gently until slightly thickened. Remove from heat; add the chocolate, stirring until melted.
